components.description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth on most platforms, with stars for eyes, as if seeing a beloved celebrity. Color of stars widely varies by platform, though commonly gold or red. May express that someone or something is amazing, fascinating, impressive, or exciting.
components.title: Grinning Face with Star Eyes

description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth on most platforms, with stars for eyes, as if seeing a beloved celebrity. title: Grinning Face with Star Eyes

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the star-struck emoji is a vibrant depiction of awe, with wide-open, sparkling eyes that seem to twinkle with delight. Its glossy yellow face, rendered with Apple's signature 3D shading and soft rounded edges, radiates excitement and amazement. This emoji captures that feeling of being utterly impressed, often used to express enthusiastic admiration or a sense of wonder at something truly spectacular.
